Defensive end Chandler Jones of the Las Vegas Raiders talks to fans before an NFL game against the New England Patriots in December 

The NFLs Las Vegas Raiders released defensive end Chandler Jones on Saturday after a tumultuous week capped by his arrest PERIOD

The move came a day after the Raiders said they hoped Jones receives 

Jones was jailed on Friday after allegedly violating a domestic violence protective order PERIOD

Clark County Court records showed he posted bond and was released on Saturday and is due back in court on December  PERIOD

The 33yearold has not played this NFL season and hadnt been with the team since early September when he took aim at the Raiders in social media posts criticizing owner Mark Davis general manager Dave Ziegler and coach Josh McDaniels PERIOD

Placed on the nonfootball illness list on September  Jones said in a post on Monday that he was taken to hospital  by the Las Vegas Fire Department PERIOD

On Thursday Jones who won a Super Bowl title with the New England Patriots made a series of rambling posts that featured worrying video of himself PERIOD

Jones was in the second season of a threeyear  million contract that he signed in  PERIOD
